diff_hunk:
@@ -219,64 +230,114 @@ if(UNIX)
 endif()
 
 if (tensorflow_ENABLE_GPU)
+  if (NOT WIN32)
+    # Default install paths for cuda libraries in Linux
+    list(APPEND CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/cuda/lib64)
+    list(APPEND CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH /usr/local/cuda/lib64/stubs)
body:
Adding options for these (additional ```CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH```) looks better.
However, they are not redundant with ```tensorflow_PATH_STATIC_LIB``` because they are not meant to be static libraries (.a); they are for shared libraries (.so).
